answers.answer: If the baby is breeched or you can't push baby out and it becomes dangerous for him/her
I had a csection due to fetal distress. Her heart was going way over 200 beats per minute.
I had to have a csection with my baby coz her heart beat kept dippin. Doctors were really worried. I am glad bt now hopin for next one its gona be natural.
you hope the next one natural? if you've had a c sec you can never deliver naturally only by c sec
At phoebe that's not true last time I had a csection and now Im going to deliver vaginal
Only if your you have a repeat problem they say no vaginal births. My friend had a c section and then a natural birth.

Yeah defo not true. Like I said I had a csection with my first 5 days late,5 days slow labour she was and with my boy he was 5 days early and everything went smoothly, a natural birth. Now I'm having a water birth with my third considering the run up to labour and baby is ok.
I had c sec due to failed induction. My baby was ok but he was 15 days late. My cervix wasnt dilating. I wanna try natural next time.

I had my first due to fetal distress, he was stuck in the birth canal because he was too large and my canal was too narrow.. breech, placenta previa, failed inductions, repeat c-sections, preeclampsia in some cases, there are many reasons.

question: What can cause you to get a c section
title: C Sections
